Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bovine Beta-defensin 9 (bBD-9; BNBD-9; BNDB-9; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 502A (MIC=10-300 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML35 (MIC=10-301 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has bactericidal activity. Active against E. coli ML35 and S. aureus 502A.

Literature.Title: Purification, primary structures, and antibacterial activities of beta-defensins, a new family of antimicrobial peptides from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Selsted ME, Tang YQ, Morris WL, McGuire PA, Novotny MJ, Smith W, Henschen AH, Cullor JS.

Literature.Title: Enteric beta-defensin molecular cloning and characterization of a gene with inducible intestinal epithelial cell expression associated with Cryptosporidium parvum infection.
Literature.Author: Tarver AP, Clark DP, Diamond G, Russell JP, Erdjument-Bromage H, Tempst P, Cohen KS, Jones DE, Sweeney RW, Wines M, Hwang S, Bevins CL.

Literature.Title: Enteric beta-defensin: molecular cloning and characterization of a gene with inducible intestinal epithelial cell expression associated with Cryptosporidium parvum infection.
Literature.Author: Erdjument-Bromage H.,Russell J.P.,Diamond G.,Clark D.P.,Tarver A.P.
